name: Dark Fairies (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté)
description:
I'm in my bedroom, moping.

It's been two weeks since Lena broke up with me. 

It was she who has told me this legend about dark fairies.

[...]

I look at the window. It's the full moon tonight.

Denis: (The Melianie Forest is close...

Maybe I should go and say the words of the legend?

After all, it's just a story.)

Oh, how wrong I was...

--------------------------

* Dark Fairies is a short Visual Novel, with ATB-type battles, made with RPG Maker MV.
